means: 使协调( attune的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Their ears were still attuned to the sounds of the London suburb.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们依然很熟悉伦敦市郊的喧闹声。

sentence.Network_en: I have become attuned to Carlisle's industrial past.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对于卡莱尔市过去的工业史已经有所了解。

sentence.Network_en: He seemed unusually attuned to people's feelings.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 看电影学英文-神鬼玩家 The Aviator ... carnality n. 肉欲 attuned a. 理解的；通达的 cylinder n. 圆筒；圆柱状.
How to develop interpersonal skills  -... ... include 包含，包括 attuned 理解的；音感好的 empower 授权，允许；使能够.
She seemed unusually attuned to people ' s feelings ., 她好像十分理解人们的情绪.
obsolete：陈旧的。attuned：合拍的。Nanjing University：居然提到母校，呵呵。.

list.abs: This energy center allows Mother Earth to attune your life force vibrations to hers ., 这个能量中心允许大地调合你的生命力振动与她一致.
long ago one's ancient ancestors lived upon the land and holographically attuned to nature's dream .很久前，人类远古的祖先生活于大陆并全息调谐到大自然梦想中。
Affect of patient 情感，个案affective attunement 情感拍合affect-trauma model 情绪创伤典范
·精神协调(Spiritual Attunement) - 增加巫医的最大法力值2011年7月的实际拍摄2010年BlizzCon上的实际拍摄　　生产方式·随时间而持续.
◇精神调和（Spiritual Attunement）等级：13 最大法力值上升20%，并且每秒额外恢复1%最大法力值。

entry.tran: 适应的;理解的;与…合拍的
entry.def: If you are attuned to something, you can understand and appreciate it.

example.ex: I have become attuned to Carlisle's industrial past...
example.tran: 我对于卡莱尔市过去的工业史已经有所了解。

example.ex: He seemed unusually attuned to people's feelings.

entry.tran: 听得出的;习惯于（某种声音）的
entry.def: If your ears are attuned to a sound, you can hear it and recognize it quickly.

example.ex: Their ears were still attuned to the sounds of the London suburb.
example.tran: 他们依然很熟悉伦敦市郊的喧闹声。

means.word_mean: 2. so adjusted as to be appropriate or brought into harmony;

sentences.sentence: "an industry not attuned to the demands of the market"
"charges finely tuned to the amount a student can afford"

auth_sentence.content: He noted how attuned children were to the devices.

auth_sentence.content: Cook invests this uncompromising dub soundscape with her pop-attuned approachability.
